name: Activity Exporter
tagline: Utility to convert sportswatch workout files to gpx format
body:
### About this project
This project had started as a response a Christmas 2014 outage of the [Movescount](http://www.movescount.com/) website. This is a Suunto owned and operated site that is used to support Suunto watches and devices.

> #### YOUR SPORTS DIARY
Store every single workout you do with the amount of detail you want. Whether you are a competing athlete, an outdoor maniac, a technical diver or just getting started with your new active life - Movescount is for you!

As you require an active connection to this website to export your workout logs from your watch, it became necessary to design a tool to analyse and convert Suunto workout files to a standard recognised format, such as .gpx. These can be used at other online analytics services, for example [Strava](http://www.strava.com/).

### Contribute to this project
Fork this project
For help with forking a GitHub project, [https://help.github.com/articles/fork-a-repo/](check this guide).

### Clone
If you prefer to take this project and take it some other places, feel free to clone it from  
`https://github.com/petrfaitl/Activity_Exporter.git`.

### Feature requests
If you would like some features incorporated?
* If you know how to code in java, please fork and submit a pull request.
* If coding is alien to you, fill in a [feedback form at the Issues page] (https://github.com/petrfaitl/Activity_Exporter/issues) and I'll have a look what I can do.

### Bugs and other issues?
If you find any problems with the utility, you can post them at the simple [issue tracker](https://github.com/petrfaitl/Activity_Exporter/issues).

### Authors and contributors
This project was initiated by Petr Faitl @petrfaitl in 2014.
